```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'

library(tinytable)

event <- rmarkdown::metadata$event
location <- rmarkdown::metadata$location
event_url <- rmarkdown::metadata$event_url
links <- rmarkdown::metadata$links

if (!is.null(event_url)) {
  event <- paste0("[",event, "](", event_url, ")")
}

cat(paste(event, location, sep = ", "))
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'

style_icon <- function(x) {
  paste("[{{<", x$icon, ">}}", x$text, "](", x$url, ")")
}

sapply(links, style_icon) |>
  paste0(
    "{.btn .btn-outline-primary}", 
    collapse = " "
  ) |> 
  cat()
```
